title: ASHA Practice Portal
description: ASHA's Practice Portal assists audiologists and speech-language pathologists in their day-to-day practices by making it easier to find the best available evidence and expertise in patient care, identify resources that have been vetted for relevance and credibility, and increase practice efficiency.
cleaned_text: The goal of ASHA's Practice Portal is to facilitate clinical decision making and increase practice efficiency for audiologists, speech-language pathologists, and assistants by providing resources on clinical and professional topics and linking to available evidence.
